titleInfo.title: "I-40 Park Route Has Coleman's Approval, Harold Ford Says"

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS 3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America, using a stylesheet available at https://github.com/digitallibraryoftennessee/DLTN_XSLT. mods.abstract: Rep. Harold Ford said yesterday U.S. Secretary of Transportation W. T. Coleman, Jr. had decided I-40 should be built through Overton Park.
